page.title: 16MORE CARS THAN LORRIES
page.content: We did not see many lorries as we saw cars because some long vehicle (lorry) are not allowed on certain road is not wide enough. We don't see many coaches as public buses because it's too busy. We see public service buses a lot because that is the way a lot of service buses go to get in to Barnsley. We didn't see many pick up trucks because they only collect dustbin in the morning. We only saw 5 private coaches because day trips only go away at weekend mostly. We saw more vans than lorries because work men use vans more than lorries because they are small and easier to use. Most firms use vans with the firms name on the side to advertise. We didn't see any push bikes at all. I think Pontefract Road is a very busy road.
